Name: フリーシア
Origin: であるなら……もう一つ。

フリーシアは自らの背後の虚空に、
己が右手をかざす。

Name: フリーシア
Origin: ミスラ……

Name: フリーシア
Origin:
絶対遵守の星晶獣よ……
我が力に平伏し、
力の奔流にその身を堕とせ！！

Name: 라캄
Origin:
おいおいおいおい……！
勘弁してくれ……！

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
あの芸当は「リアクター」を通じて
収集した力によるものか……

Name: フリーシア
Origin:
おや？
ずいぶんと表情が硬くなりましたね。

Name: フリーシア
Origin:
笑っていられないのは、
私の方ではありませんでしたか？

Name: 흑기사
Origin: くっ……！

Name: フリーシア
Origin:
さぁ……
余興はここまでです。

Name: フリーシア
Origin:
もしも貴方達が彼らを想うなら、
思う存分、力の捌け口となりなさい！
はあぁぁぁっ！！

Name: リーシャ
Origin:
……この程度では、
些細なダメージにもならないようですね。

Name: オルキス
Origin: リーシャ……！

Name: 카타리나
Origin: すまない！ 遅くなった！

Name: 루리아
Origin: カタリナっ！

Name: 이오
Origin:
うわぁ……
な、なにあれ……

Name: 라캄
Origin:
やれやれ……
見たまんま、面倒事だってのは確かだ。

Name: ロゼッタ
Origin:
ふぅん……なるほどね。
ずいぶん困ったことになったわね。

Name: 오이겐
Origin:
いや……そうでもねぇさ。
なぁ！ [ジータ]！

Name: 비이
Origin:
おうさ！
確かに相手は増えちまったけど……

Name: 비이
Origin:
今度はオイラ達だって、
全員集合だからな！

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
確かに……
これだけの人数が揃っていれば、
勝機が見えないこともないな。

Name: オルキス
Origin: 皆で……頑張る。

再集結した[ジータ]一行は、
堕とされし２体の星晶獣に挑む。
２体の星晶獣は[ジータ]達との戦いで過剰な力を発散し落ち着きを取り戻すが、その間にフリーシアは姿を消していた。ルリアとオルキスはリヴァイアサン達に流れ込んでいた力の帯の残滓を感じ取り、[ジータ]達はそれを辿ることで「リアクター」の元へと進む。

リヴァイアサン・マリス、
ミスラ・マリスを退ける
[ジータ]一行。

しかし、その時すでに、
フリーシアは一行の前から
姿を消してしまっていた。

Name: 루리아
Origin:
過剰に注がれていた力が発散されて、
ようやく落ち着いたみたいです……

Name: 라캄
Origin:
しかし……それで宰相サンは、
いったいどこに行っちまったんだ？

Name: 라캄
Origin:
まぁ、流石に、こいつらと戦いながら、
そっちにまで気を払う余裕は
なかったけどよ……

Name: オルキス
Origin: わかる……かもしれない。

Name: 루리아
Origin:
うん……
まだ少しだけ、帯が残ってる……

Name: 이오
Origin: 帯？

Name: オルキス
Origin:
さっきの……
リヴァイアサン達に流れ込んでた力……

Name: オルキス
Origin:
もうずいぶん薄くなってる……けど、
私達なら……まだ、見える。

Name: 루리아
Origin:
この力の帯は……
タワーの中心のほうから
来てるみたいです。

Name: 카타리나
Origin:
では……
そこにフリーシア宰相が……？

Name: 흑기사
Origin:
それは早計と言えるだろうな……
しかし、その力が「リアクター」から
供給されたものならば……

Name: 오이겐
Origin:
その帯を辿りゃあ、
「リアクター」を
見つけられるってことだなぁ、おい……

Name: 라캄
Origin:
けどまぁ……状況が状況だ。
宰相サンもわざわざ「リアクター」から
離れたりしねぇだろうな……

[ジータ]一行は、
ルリア、オルキスの視線を辿り、
力の帯の行く先を見やる。

その果てにある決戦への覚悟を固め、
一行は再びタワーを進み始めるのだった。

[Djeeta] and company find collapsed soldiers inside the Tower—a result of reactor activity. They move deeper into the Tower in order to stop the reactor as well as Freesia, until they are blocked by Gandharva. Lecia and Katalina engage in a showdown with him on behalf of the crew.
Having once clashed with [Djeeta] and company in the town of Agastia...
Gandharva now lies in wait within the Tower, eagerly anticipating his next confrontation with the crew.
Gandharva gazes at the flash of his blade slicing through the air as he reflects on the last battle.

Name: Lecia
Origin: I won't allow you to hurt anyone else! I'm going to defeat you here and now!

Name: Lecia
Origin: We can do this, [Djeeta]. I'm not going to run away again. I will not lose!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hah! Even if we've gotta take both of them head on, there's no way I'm backin' down!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Right! Now everyone's here...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Let's go, [Djeeta]! If we're all together, we'll be okay for sure!

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: Lieutenant General Gandharva! Your Excellency! I have urgent news!
Gandharva returns the blade to its sheath as he turns toward the soldier.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Speak... What have you to tell me?

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: Those skyfarers have gotten inside the Tower...

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Humph. I see... Well, no need to fuss. It was only a matter of time.

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: Th-that's not all! There seems to be something... mysterious going on.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Something mysterious? More intruders perhaps?

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: No, sir... It's unclear what's happening.

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: We're getting reports all over that the entire capital, not just the Tower, appears to be under attack.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Appears' to be, you say? Quit beating around the bush. What do you mean?

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: Well... Both soldiers and civilians are coming down with a strange illness one after another.

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: They're quickly increasing in number and more than a few have fallen into a stupor...

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Sounds as if the Crew of Enforcers and the Valtz Duchy have made their move to help that pitiful crew.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: And no mercy for civilians! They've got more spunk than I gave them credit for.

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: B-but it seems both the Crew of Enforcers and the Valtz Army are badly hit.

Name: Imperial Soldier
Origin: And, sir, it seems the epicenter of the damage can be traced... back to the Tower.
The soldier collapses on his feet, but Gandharva catches him in an instant.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Humph... So this was their intent all along...
After lowering the soldier to the floor, Gandharva rises, his favorite blade in his grip.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Not the most ideal timing... But it doesn't change what must be done in the end.
Gandharva opens the door and heads down a path within the Tower.
Further ahead, [Djeeta] and company are scrambling to put a halt to Freesia's plans.
After putting an end to Furias's rampage, [Djeeta] and company make their way through the Tower.
But as they push forward, [Djeeta] and company come across an unexpected sight.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Was this a part of Freesia's plan all along?

Name: Black Knight
Origin: No... I'm not sure what to make of this, but their real goal lies just ahead.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: And once it's awakened, that will be the end. We won't even be able to see it coming.
With a look of both sternness and pity, the Black Knight gazes about her feet.
As [Djeeta] and company go deeper into the Tower, they find even more imperial soldiers collapsed on the ground.

Name: Orchis
Origin: Is everyone... asleep?

Name: Lecia
Origin: This is clearly abnormal... There's no mistake that this was caused by the reactor.

Name: Rackam
Origin: It's so quiet compared to the ruckus out there. To think we'd be dealing with this...

Name: Io
Origin: But hey! We've seen this before, right? When that guy took us around...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yeah... They look a lot like those people we saw when Adam led us to that place.

Name: Eugen
Origin: And he was sayin' that all of 'em were test subjects for making the reactor.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: In other words, the reactor is running smoothly, just as they tested.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: If we fail to stop the reactor... to stop Freesia, then the entire capital will end up like this in no time.

Name: Eugen
Origin: No siree... That's not gonna fly with me.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Yeah... You're right. If this ends up spreading all over the capital...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Then it means that primal beast Akasha is gonna make its move, huh...

Name: Orchis
Origin: Once it comes to that... who knows what could happen next?

Name: Lyria
Origin: We can't... We won't...
[Djeeta] and company, thinking they were all alone in the tower, spun around at the sound of footsteps.
Before them stands a man in full military regalia.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Why, hello... Why so stiff all of a sudden? Am I interrupting something?

Name: Katalina
Origin: Gandharva! So you've been slithering around the Tower this whole time?

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Really... Coming all this way...

Name: Gandharva
Origin: You've managed to peek under the 'mask' of the empire, but we're beyond that little speech now, aren't we?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Looks like we've got another problem on our hands...

Name: Lecia
Origin: Yes... But our ultimate goal is to reach the reactor.

Name: Lecia
Origin: We should split up and search for it, not waste all our focus on what's in front of us.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Now, now... Let's not get ahead of ourselves. I've got some business with you first.

Name: Io
Origin: Of course we're trying to get ahead! If we don't, we'll be in a world of trouble! For real!

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Humph... So what?

Name: Io
Origin: What!

Name: Gandharva
Origin: That issue's fine for now... For now, that is.

Name: Io
Origin: For... For now?

Name: Eugen
Origin: Hey now... Since you know so much about what's goin' down, how 'bout you tell us what you're really up to?

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Fair enough... But before that, answer me this.
Gandharva points his blade at the fallen soldiers.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: All this... Is this your work?

Name: Katalina
Origin: No... It may be pointless to try and assert our innocence to you at a time like this...

Name: Katalina
Origin: But we're in shock as well. It's most likely the work of Freesia's reactor.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Humph... Once again making a mess of things...

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Look. We intend to stop her. Would you mind stepping aside?

Name: Gandharva
Origin: My apologies! I've no intention of delaying you, but I'm afraid I have a pressing task to attend to.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: A pressing task?

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Ah... I've something more important to me than this world... more than Freesia's ambitions.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: And that... is ultimate strength.

Name: Io
Origin: Ultimate strength... But why?

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Laughable! It's almost laughable, don't you think! But yes! That is my purpose.

Name: Io
Origin: What! You've got to be kidding!

Name: Gandharva
Origin: I'm far from earning it now, being that you brats still pose a threat to me...

Name: Gandharva
Origin: But I won't have it anymore. And so...
Gandharva raises his sword, glaring at [Djeeta] and company.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Let us settle this. Here and now.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Enough of this. No hard feelings, but we couldn't care less about whatever strength you're so eager to prove.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: So you intend to ignore me and move along?

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Taking out prey from behind isn't my style... but I'm not entirely against it.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Why, you—

Name: Lecia
Origin: Fine. I'll take it from here.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Lecia?
[Djeeta] and company watch as Lecia takes a step toward Gandharva.

Name: Lecia
Origin: Everyone, keep moving forward. And leave this to me.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Woah, woah! Wait! You're gonna fight him on your own?

Name: Lecia
Origin: To stop the reactor, we need as many people as we can.

Name: Lecia
Origin: And I... and my father are the reason behind this terrible mess.

Name: Lecia
Origin: That's why I just can't run away from this fight.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: I'm glad you see things my way... Now, are you done chatting? Because my sword has something to say!
Gandharva draws his blade. Lecia responds in kind.
The intensity from both sides is palpable. However, the first to make a move is someone unexpected.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Really... I always thought you were a little strange.
Katalina places a hand on Lecia's shoulder.

Name: Lecia
Origin: What?

Name: Katalina
Origin: There's no reason to ever shoulder such a heavy burden alone, no matter the stakes.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Haven't you learned anything since we stood off against you and your crew?

Name: Lecia
Origin: But... but!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Indeed, we need many of us searching at once... but I think I'll stay behind for now. I hope you don't mind, [Djeeta].
Watch her back, Katalina.
I guess you have a point.

Name: Katalina
Origin: I will. We'll both catch up to you soon.

Name: Katalina
Origin: So keep an eye on Lyria until then, [Djeeta].

Name: Katalina
Origin: Yes... There's no mistake that we want as many hands as possible to stop the reactor.

Name: Katalina
Origin: But even so, a one-on-one against him is just too big a risk to take.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Well... This gets more interesting by the second.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Katalina...

Name: Katalina
Origin: It's okay, Lyria. There's nothing to worry about. Right, Lecia?

Name: Lecia
Origin: R-right! You can trust us to handle this!

Name: Lyria
Origin: But...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Now go... We can't waste anymore time.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Besides that... Your power is surely needed elsewhere, Lyria.

Name: Katalina
Origin: So leave this to us. You must go ahead with [Djeeta] and everyone.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: I g-guess we gotta go... Lecia! Katalina! You better catch up!

Name: Lecia
Origin: Yep! Of course!

Name: Katalina
Origin: Ah. That's a promise.
And so, Lecia and Katalina stay behind while [Djeeta] and company venture further into the tower.
Katalina watches the gang until they disappear down the path before turning once again to Gandharva.

Name: Katalina
Origin: Well then... Shall we make this quick, Lieutenant General Gandharva?

Name: Lecia
Origin: I'm afraid we have plans after this... So we can't stay for very long!

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Humph... It's no matter to me.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: But I'll have you give back what you've stolen... My ultimate strength!

Name: Gandharva
Origin: I'm going to be the strongest there is! Finishing you off will be the first step to that end!

While searching for the reactor, [Djeeta] and company run into Fenrir, who seeks Akasha. Io is angered by how Fenrir speaks of primal beasts—including Rosetta—as objects. The two prepare to battle, but Rosetta steps in to help settle it once and for all.
In order to get [Djeeta] and company to move ahead, Lecia and Katalina face off against Gandharva.
Unable to withstand their fierce attacks, Gandharva begins to crumple in pain.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Argh! Agh...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Huff... Huff... You're out of steam, aren't you, Lieutenant General?

Name: Lecia
Origin: Huff... Huff... We have... already won!
With Gandharva on his knees, Lecia holds her sword against him...

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Urgh! Ahh.... Hahahahaha!

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Well done... I don't think I could move an inch more...

Name: Gandharva
Origin: After coming this far, I've no regrets at all...

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Come on... Do it then.

Name: Lecia
Origin: What?

Name: Katalina
Origin: Just what are you doing, Lieutenant General?

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Don't you understand? I said we'd settle this here and now.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: So do it... If you don't, I will surely challenge you again.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: There's only one ending... An ending in death. And if I don't meet that ending now, then someday I'll have you meet it instead.

Name: Lecia
Origin: Then bring it on!

Name: Gandharva
Origin: What?

Name: Lecia
Origin: If you intend to keep after us, then I intend to fight you... and crush you every time.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: And for that... you choose not to take my life?

Name: Lecia
Origin: That's right.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: And you'll leave me this way every single time?

Name: Lecia
Origin: Yep! Right now, I may be a member of [Djeeta]'s crew...

Name: Lecia
Origin: But I'm also still a member of the Crew of Enforcers. As such, I will not allow myself to kill.
Gandharva's eyes grow wide, but before long his mouth twists into a sneer.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Hah... Hahahaha! Perfect!

Name: Gandharva
Origin: You've become just as impudent as that idiotic jerk!

Name: Lecia
Origin: What!

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Ah... Oh dear... Are we still sensitive about our daddy issues?

Name: Lecia
Origin: No. Right now, I can honestly be proud of my father.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Humph... Is that so?
Gandharva drags himself up and points his feet toward the Tower's exit.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Lecia... I'll let you keep that ultimate strength a little longer.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: However... I'll surely be back for it. So don't you dare let down your guard.

Name: Lecia
Origin: Fine... I'll be waiting.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: Hmm... Something may be more than a little wrong with me.

Name: Gandharva
Origin: (I was never one to be cautious with my life. I'd finally found my pleasure, and that's all I needed.)

Name: Gandharva
Origin: (I thought I'd die like a soldier, but I gained new joy and shamelessly sought it...)
And so, Gandharva disappears into the path from which the crew had come.
When Katalina can no longer see him, she gives a heavy sigh.

Name: Katalina
Origin: My goodness... Someday he'll return.

Name: Lecia
Origin: Yes... But that 'someday' isn't today.

Name: Lecia
Origin: So... let's get moving. [Djeeta] and the others are waiting!
Meanwhile the crew is making their way through the Tower as they search for the reactor.
Suddenly Vyrn pricks up his ears, and with a strange look on his face he begins to murmur.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whoa... Did you guys hear that? It was pretty loud...

Name: Io
Origin: Hmm? I didn't hear anything..

Name: Lyria
Origin: It's... It's a... primal beast? And it's coming! Watch out!
Rawwwwr!

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Huh? You guys?

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Ah! Look who it is...

Name: Rackam
Origin: It's you! You're a pal of Loki's!

Name: Eugen
Origin: Hoo boy... Don't tell me he's somewhere around here too.
Eugen carefully goes for his gun as he scans the surroundings.
But Fenrir, undaunted, responds casually.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: He's not here.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Really? I guess that would mean you're here all alone now.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: So, my dear... What business might you have with us?

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Well, it's not like I was looking for you.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: But... This might be perfect. I can save myself some work.

Name: Io
Origin: Work? What're you saying?

Name: Fenrir
Origin: I've got a bone to pick with that primal beast Akasha... Now how about you tell me where it is?

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Akasha? And just what do you plan to do when you find it?

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Huh? What d'you mean? Of course... I wanna use it.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Hmm... At least you're honest. But it's no use... We can't tell you where Akasha is.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: What?

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Well, you see, we're still searching for it ourselves.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: But aren't you a sly dog. To think you'd pay any mind to history or the past.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Bah! No way. I'm not in it for me... This is all for Loki.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: That jerk... If he was so irked, he could've just used me to do whatever he wanted.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: I would've gotten him Akasha. All he had to do was give the order...

Name: Fenrir
Origin: And he of all people should be able to handle it effortlessly.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: He is pure Astral, a blood relative of the previous ruler. There is no heir more fitting than him.
Fenrir, reminded of Loki's indecisiveness, begins to bubble over with discontent.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: If he was really the pride of the Astrals, he could've used us primal beasts to conquer this world and more...

Name: Io
Origin: Humph...

Name: Fenrir
Origin: But he's holding back instead...

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Us primal beasts are here to serve the Astrals... right? Don't you agree?
Fenrir prods Rosetta further.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Don't be shy. You're just like me after all.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Just like me... Just some Astral weapon.
Before Rosetta can open her mouth to respond, a young lady pipes in with a rebuttal.

Name: Io
Origin: You keep talking about 'being used' and 'being a weapon,' but... stop treating my friend like an object!

Name: Io
Origin: Aren't you one of them? How can you just... call yourself a thing!

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Bah! Clueless brats should just keep their mouths shut!

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Don't you get it? Coming into existence and being completely self-aware without knowing what you are...

Name: Fenrir
Origin: The terror of being deemed a failure after being modified over and over again!

Name: Io
Origin: As if! How could I ever understand... what primal beasts have gone through.

Name: Io
Origin: But no matter the past, Rosetta is my dear friend right now!

Name: Io
Origin: So who cares? Who cares if you're a primal beast or not?

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Really? Then how about a taste of this primal beast power you don't seem to care about!

Name: Io
Origin: Humph... Thought you'd never ask! With my magic, I'll take care of you in a... Huh?
Io has drawn her staff, but Rosetta stands before her.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Thank you, Io... But let me take it from here.

Name: Io
Origin: Rosetta!

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Everyone, I'll be taking care of things here. Now's not the time to stand still, so the rest of you push on.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: I see... Then let's go, [Djeeta].

Name: Vyrn
Origin: B-but... Katalina and Lecia aren't here yet...

Name: Black Knight
Origin: There's no need for us all to move together.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: All we need is a single person to reach the reactor and stop it. Any one of us can do it.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Well... You sure make a point there...

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Hehe! It'll be fine... I'll catch up to you soon.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Hey... Don't you go making promises you can't keep.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: I'll overlook your friends, but I won't let that kid witch get away! I'm about to chew you up!

Loki appears before Fenrir, halting her battle against Rosetta and Io to take her away. Elsewhere, [Djeeta] and company hear a terrifying scream and follow the sound to find Freesia and an anguished Leviathan ready to attack.

Name: Io
Origin: Huff... Huff...

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Huff... Damn you...
Rosetta and Io meet Fenrir blow for blow, but no matter how hard they attack, there is no end in sight.

Name: Io
Origin: Ha, hahaha! For someone talking big earlier, you sure look dog-tired!

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Shut it! It's these chains... Then again, you two are no match for me. Chains or no chains!

Name: Fenrir
Origin: I'll end this quick... Prepare for your pummeling!

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Brace yourself, Io!

Name: Io
Origin: I've got this! As long as we're together, we'll never lose!
They each unleash a devastating strike, using all the power they can muster.
However, none of their blows land, instead disappearing into thin air.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Wha!

Name: Io
Origin: W-what? What's going on here?

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Is this... Astral power?

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Geez, Loki!

Name: Loki
Origin: Fenrir... We're done here.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Loki! Just what're you saying?

Name: Loki
Origin: Enough... We don't belong here anymore.

Name: Loki
Origin: So, Fenrir... Let us go. We're off to find a new place for us.
Loki musters a feeble smile on his crestfallen face, then turns to Rosetta and Io.

Name: Loki
Origin: Ah, that's right! I heard you've all made a proper mess of Erste's center.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Well, it wasn't the goal really... We were only trying to stop Freesia in her tracks.

Name: Loki
Origin: It's all the same to me. But... I suppose everyone's lost interest in the empire by now.

Name: Loki
Origin: Freesia has lost all control, and with General Adam's betrayal on top of that, it's just a countdown to their collapse.

Name: Loki
Origin: Of course, we can't be sure which will fall first. The empire, or this world...

Name: Loki
Origin: In any case, we shall take our leave. This has been quite entertaining...

Name: Loki
Origin: Don't you know? If you play with dirt, it gets in your eye...

Name: Io
Origin: Dirt? You mean after what you've done, Erste is just some playground to you?

Name: Loki
Origin: Sure, who knows... Let's go, Fenrir.

Name: Fenrir
Origin: Bah...

Name: Io
Origin: H-hey! Wait!

Name: Io
Origin: Come on now! Just who does he think he is?
Rosetta is in deep thought as Loki and Fenrir disappear into the distance.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: (My injury from the War has left me with only fragments of memories about the Astrals...)

Name: Rosetta
Origin: (But I can't help but wonder why they fought so fiercely against this world...)

Name: Rosetta
Origin: (Was it a need for new territory to rule? Or was it perhaps... for twisted fun?)

Name: Rosetta
Origin: (Mmm... To be on the side of the Astrals, but never knowing the reason you fight...)

Name: Rosetta
Origin: (Just a weapon to be used. What a terrifying truth to confront...)
As Rosetta reflects harshly upon herself, she feels a warmth against her gloved hand.
Io, her face full of worry, is holding Rosetta's hand in hers.

Name: Io
Origin: Rosetta? What's wrong? Are you all right?

Name: Io
Origin: Rosetta?

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Mmm... It's nothing at all. Now, shall we go? We must hurry to catch up with [Djeeta].
Rosetta gently squeezes Io's hand and moves toward the exit without letting go.

Name: Io
Origin: Whoa! W-wait, Rosetta! Wait! Don't walk so fast!

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Haha...
Forced to separate from their friends, the crew continues through the Tower in search of the reactor.

Name: Lyria
Origin: You know, it feels kind of gloomy when we're not all together...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Hey, it's okay! They'll catch up to us in no time!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Yep... So while they're gone, we gotta do what we can!

Name: Orchis
Origin: Everyone's trying their best... So... I'll give it a try too...

Name: Eugen
Origin: Well, it'd be fine if we're on track to getting closer to this reactor, eh?

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Regardless, it seems there's no mistake that it's somewhere in this tower...

Name: Black Knight
Origin: We're running out of time, but if we scour the area...
Suddenly, a deafening scream echoes throughout the Tower.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: W-what was that? A scream?

Name: Black Knight
Origin: But something about that doesn't sound natural...

Name: Lyria
Origin: That was a... primal beast.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Its pain... and suffering... I can feel it directly.

Name: Rackam
Origin: A primal beast, you say... Did something happen to Akasha?

Name: Lyria
Origin: I... don't know. It's clearly a primal beast, but I'm not sure which one...

Name: Eugen
Origin: But we know for sure something's up. And the way things are looking, we're not in the clear...

Name: Eugen
Origin: First, let's head in the direction of that sound, [Djeeta]!
[Djeeta] and company follow the sound all the way to the outside of a certain room.

Name: Freesia
Origin: Urggh...
Inside the room is Freesia, alone and still.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Freesia!

Name: Eugen
Origin: Huh? Where's the beast? All I see's the prime minister...

Name: Lyria
Origin: But something... just doesn't feel right here.

Name: Freesia
Origin: You're here... Well, of course you are. I knew you'd come...

Name: Freesia
Origin: However, all those other pests have left the stage and now, only you stand in my way.

Name: Freesia
Origin: The reactor is generating power quite smoothly. We need only wait...

Name: Freesia
Origin: Don't you understand? Once I've gathered all the power I need, nothing can stop me.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: We need only wait, you say... Do you really expect us to stand around and do nothing?

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Fine. I suppose we can entertain you while you wait...

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Just as long as you understand that your plans end here with us.

Name: Freesia
Origin: You're hilarious... But, as usual, it seems you haven't quite grasped the situation here.

Name: Freesia
Origin: It's already settled. The end of the world... The end of history...

Name: Freesia
Origin: Our tainted past shall be purified, and the world will finally move forward onto the righteous path.

Name: Freesia
Origin: Yes, yes... This time she will surely choose wisely, with no mistakes.

Name: Black Knight
Origin: She?

Name: Rackam
Origin: No offense, Prime Minister, but I think you might be the one who's outta touch here.

Name: Freesia
Origin: What?

Name: Rackam
Origin: That reactor you activated has your soldiers laid out like planks.

Name: Rackam
Origin: As soon as we got in the Tower, we turned your uppity little major general on his tail.

Name: Rackam
Origin: And that lieutenant general of yours should be beggin' for mercy from Katalina and Lecia by now.

Name: Rackam
Origin: Just how do you expect to win a fight against us?

Name: Freesia
Origin: Well, I'm not hesitant to do a bit of dirty work myself. However...

Name: Eugen
Origin: The heck!

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Freesia! Don't tell me...

Name: Orchis
Origin: Ah... It's...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Leviathan?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Hey, hey, hey! You've gotta be kidding me... What's Leviathan doin' here?

Name: Freesia
Origin: This is not Leviathan with its core intact, but rather a copy infused with power, so it's somewhat limited...

Name: Freesia
Origin: But it's quite sufficient to handle all of you.
Upon seeing Leviathan as a ruin of its former self, Eugen, at a loss for words, can only clench his fists.

Name: Eugen
Origin: Enough... I've had about enough of this!

Name: Eugen
Origin: Between you and that lil' major general, our seas have suffered enough!

Name: Eugen
Origin: Hold on, Leviathan! I swear on my Auguste pride that I'm gonna set you free!

[Djeeta] and company subdue Leviathan Malice, only to have Freesia infuse more power into it as well as Mithra Malice. Just when the beasts are about to descend upon [Djeeta]'s crew, Katalina, Lecia, Io, and Rosetta return, allowing them to fight as one.
[Djeeta] and company meet their match against Leviathan.
Though the crew is beginning to exhaust its strength, fortunately Leviathan, too, slowly recedes from its powerful rampage.

Name: Eugen
Origin: Gasp...

Name: Lyria
Origin: It looks like Leviathan is calming down...

Name: Freesia
Origin: Hehe...

Name: Black Knight
Origin: What's so funny? I don't think now's the time for you to be laughing.

Name: Freesia
Origin: Yes, yes... You're right... Absolutely right.

Name: Freesia
Origin: However, as I've already explained, you are the only thing standing in my way now.

Name: Freesia
Origin: As such, I can easily spare a little more energy to waste on you.
Freesia waves her right arm high.

Name: Rackam
Origin: What?
In time with her movement, a darkly shining power band appears out of thin air, coiling itself around Freesia's right arm.

Name: Lyria
Origin: What? It can't be!

Name: Orchis
Origin: S-stop!
As Freesia lowers her arm, the power band snakes out toward Leviathan, causing the sea dragon to roar in grief.

Name: Freesia
Origin: Heh heh... Hahahaha!

Name: Freesia
Origin: It's newly generated energy from the reactor! How does it feel?

Name: Freesia
Origin: Now you should have enough power! Tear them to pieces, Leviathan!

Name: Lyria
Origin: It's terrible... That power is raging throughout its body. I can hear its pain... and its suffering.

Name: Freesia
Origin: Ah, that's right... You were well matched against Leviathan just now...

Name: Freesia
Origin: So how about... another old friend?
Freesia holds up her right hand to the empty space behind her.

Name: Freesia
Origin: Mithra...

Name: Freesia
Origin: Primal beast of absolute obedience! Bow before my prowess! And give in to the torrent of power!

Name: Rackam
Origin: Hey, hey, hey now! Give us a break here!

Name: Black Knight
Origin: So that little stunt uses concentrated power from the reactor...

Name: Freesia
Origin: What's this? Why the stern face?

Name: Freesia
Origin: Could it be that now's the time for me to be laughing?

Name: Freesia
Origin: Now... I'm afraid the fun stops here.

Name: Freesia
Origin: If you care at all for these beasts, then give up your power to me!
Haaah!

Name: Lecia
Origin: I guess that's not quite enough to do damage.

Name: Orchis
Origin: Lecia...

Name: Katalina
Origin: Sorry we're late!

Name: Lyria
Origin: Katalina!

Name: Io
Origin: Woah... What is that?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Boy oh boy... As you can see, things are getting a little sticky.

Name: Rosetta
Origin: Hmm... I see. We've gotten ourselves into quite a mess.

Name: Eugen
Origin: Nay... Don't count us out yet, right, [Djeeta]?

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You bet! There's two of 'em to fight now...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: But it's all of us against them this time!

Name: Black Knight
Origin: Good point... With this many of us, we might just stand a chance.

Name: Orchis
Origin: Everyone... Let's work together.
[Djeeta] and company, back together again, prepare to take on the two primal beasts.

[Djeeta] and company defeat both primal beasts, ridding them of their excess power. However, Freesia has disappeared. Lyria and Orchis sense traces of energy from Freesia's power band and use it to guide [Djeeta] and company toward the reactor.
[Djeeta] and company are able to drive back both Leviathan Malice and Mithra Malice.
However, Freesia is no longer anywhere to be seen.

Name: Lyria
Origin: It seems all that extra power scattered away, and the primals are finally calming down.

Name: Rackam
Origin: But now, where did that prime minister lady run off to?

Name: Rackam
Origin: Ah, but she can't be expected to stick around for the fight with other plans up her sleeve.

Name: Orchis
Origin: I might know... where she is.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yeah... Some of that band still remains.

Name: Io
Origin: Band?

Name: Orchis
Origin: That power... that was flowing into the primal beasts just now.

Name: Orchis
Origin: It's weak... but we can... still see it.

Name: Lyria
Origin: The power band seems to come from the heart of the Tower.

Name: Katalina
Origin: That means... Freesia is there too?

Name: Black Knight
Origin: It may be too hasty to say for sure. But if that power is being supplied by the reactor...

Name: Eugen
Origin: Then we can find the reactor by reaching that band, you reckon?

Name: Rackam
Origin: But... options are limited. And the prime minister won't keep her distance from the reactor.
[Djeeta] and company follow Orchis and Lyria's gaze into the distance, toward the source of the power band.
Steeling themselves for the final battle up ahead, they continue deeper into the Tower.
